title: Red Rose
description: This beautiful red rose is a perfect gift for any occasion. It is ideal for romantic moments.

title: White Daffodil
description: The elegant white lily represents purity and refinement, making it a wonderful choice for special occasions.

title: Delicate Peony
description: Peonies are known for their lush blossoms and are often associated with love and prosperity.

title: Bright Gerbera
description: With their vibrant colors and large blooms, gerberas bring joy and happiness, making them a popular choice for celebrations

title: Purple Orchid
description: Exotic and stunning, purple orchids symbolize beauty and strength, perfect for expressing admiration.

title: Red Tulip
description: Bright and cheerful, yellow tulips are a symbol of friendship and warmth, ideal for celebrating cheerful moments.

title: Yellow Aster
description: Known for its star-like shape, the blue aster symbolizes daintiness and is a lovely addition to any bouquet.

title: Spring Daffodil
description: A herald of spring, daffodils are bright and cheerful, symbolizing renewal and new beginnings.

title: Indoor Violet
description: These charming flowers are often seen as a symbol of loyalty and devotion, making them perfect for indoor gardens.
